entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: SE 24 km/h gust 37 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:32 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 5:32 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h after midnight except 60 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 5:32 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
